title: Married At First Sight: Martha Kalifatidis goes braless in a white dress
text:
She tied the knot with her Married At First Sight husband Michael Brunelli last year.

But Martha Kalifatidis looked positively bridal as she went bra-less in an elegant white gown.

Taking to Instagram, the 31-year-old reality star flaunted her famous curves in the $320 dress from SIR The Label.

Preparing for a wedding? Married At First Sight star Martha Kalifatidis (right) flaunted her curves in an elegant white dress after showing off a diamond ring in an Instagram snap shared on the weekend, sparking wedding rumours

She uploaded a video of herself with her fashionista friend Molly King, as they tried on dresses in a boutique store in Bondi beach.

Martha wrote: 'If you see us coming into your store... sorry in advance!'

Clearly enjoying their photoshoot, the Kim Kardashian lookalike accentuated her curves as she posed in the mirror.

Something to tell us? Martha's bridal look comes after she stepped out wearing a sparkling diamond ring on her right hand last week

She accessorised the sleeveless number with statement square sunglasses and wore her long, brunette tresses loose.

Martha's bridal look comes after she stepped out wearing a sparkling diamond ring on her right hand last week.

She recently returned from Los Angeles with boyfriend Michael, 28, whom she 'wed' in a non legally-binding ceremony on this year's Married At First Sight.

They are one of two remaining couples from the season, alongside Cameron Merchant and Jules Robinson.

On September 29, Martha marked their one-year 'wedding' anniversary, taking to Instagram to share a photo of herself naked and embracing Michael.

The picture that saw the pair standing on a balcony in front of a beach view, was captioned simply: 'One year, my dear.'

Unit: Martha 'wed' Michael Brunelli (pictured), 28, in a non legally-binding ceremony on Married At First Sight, and celebrated their one-year 'anniversary' in September

Since skyrocketing to fame on the reality dating series, Martha has emerged as one of Australia's most popular influencers.

She now leads a life of luxury attending celebrity events, and jetting to and from exotic destinations on trips with her primary school teacher beau.

Martha has worked with major brands from fashion powerhouse Pretty Little Thing to apps such as ShopBack.
description: She tied the knot with her Married At First Sight husband Michael Brunelli last year.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
